name: Aloo Tomato Sabzi
steps: Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a pan over medium heat for 1 minute.
Add 1 teaspoon of cumin seeds and let them sizzle for 30 seconds.
Add 100g chopped onions and sauté until golden brown (about 5 minutes).
Add 300g diced potatoes and stir for 2 minutes.
Add 200g chopped tomatoes, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1/2 teaspoon turmeric.
Mix well and cook covered on low heat for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Check if potatoes are soft. If not, cook for another 5 minutes.
Turn off heat and serve hot.

name: Mixed Vegetable Curry
steps: Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add 100g chopped onions and sauté until golden brown (5 minutes).
Add 150g chopped tomatoes and cook for 3 minutes.
Add 100g carrots, 100g beans, 100g capsicum, 50g peas, and 1 teaspoon salt.
Stir well and cook covered on medium heat for 12 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add 1 teaspoon garam masala and mix.
Cook for another 2 minutes and serve hot.

name: Paneer Butter Masala
steps: Heat 1 tablespoon oil and 2 tablespoons butter in a pan.
Add 100g chopped onions and sauté until golden (5 minutes).
Add 1 teaspoon ginger garlic paste and cook for 1 minute.
Add 200g chopped tomatoes and cook until soft (5 minutes).
Blend mixture to make smooth gravy.
Return to pan, add 250g paneer cubes, 50ml cream, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp garam masala.
Cook on low heat for 5 minutes and serve hot.

name: Chana Masala
steps: Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a pan.
Add 1 teaspoon cumin seeds and let them splutter.
Add 100g chopped onions and sauté until golden (5 minutes).
Add 1 teaspoon ginger garlic paste and cook for 1 minute.
Add 150g chopped tomatoes, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder, and cook for 5 minutes.
Add 250g soaked chickpeas with water to cover.
Cook on medium heat for 15 minutes, then add 1 tsp garam masala.
Simmer for 2 minutes and serve hot.

name: Palak Paneer
steps: Blanch 250g spinach in boiling water for 2 minutes, then blend to puree.
Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a pan, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions and sauté till golden.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes and 2 cloves crushed garlic, cook 3 minutes.
Add spinach puree, 200g paneer cubes, 1 tsp salt.
Cook on low heat for 5 minutes.
Add 50ml cream, mix well and serve hot.

name: Aloo Gobi
steps: Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a pan, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté until golden brown (5 minutes).
Add 200g diced potatoes and 200g cauliflower florets, stir 2 minutes.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, cook 10 minutes covered.
Add 1 tsp garam masala, mix and cook 2 more minutes.
Serve hot.

name: Bhindi Masala
steps: Wash and chop 250g okra, pat dry.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté until golden (5 minutes).
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, cook 5 minutes.
Add okra, mix well, cook covered 10 minutes on medium heat.
Add 1 tsp garam masala, mix and serve hot.

name: Matar Paneer
steps: Heat 2 tbsp oil in a pan, add 100g chopped onions, sauté till golden.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 150g chopped tomatoes, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, cook 5 minutes.
Add 200g paneer cubes and 100g peas, stir well.
Cook on low heat for 10 minutes, add 1 tsp garam masala, mix and serve hot.

name: Baingan Bharta
steps: Roast 300g eggplant over flame until skin chars and pulp softens.
Peel skin, mash pulp and set aside.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions and 2 crushed garlic cloves, sauté 5 minutes.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, 1 tsp red chili powder, 1 tsp salt, cook 3 minutes.
Add mashed eggplant, mix well, cook 5 more minutes and serve hot.

name: Paneer Bhurji
steps: Crumble 200g paneer and keep aside.
Heat 2 tbsp oil in a pan, add 1 tsp cumin seeds, let them sizzle.
Add 100g chopped onions and sauté till golden (5 minutes).
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, 1 chopped green chili, 1/2 tsp turmeric, and 1 tsp salt, cook 3 minutes.
Add crumbled paneer, mix well, cook for 5 minutes.
Serve hot with roti or rice.

name: Sev Tamatar Sabzi
steps: Heat 2 tbsp oil in a pan, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 250g chopped tomatoes, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp turmeric, and 1 tsp coriander powder, cook 5-6 minutes until soft.
Add 50g sev, mix gently, cook for 2 more minutes.
Serve hot with roti or as side dish.

name: Jeera Aloo
steps: Boil 300g potatoes, peel, and dice them.
Heat 2 tbsp oil in a pan, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add diced potatoes, 1/2 tsp turmeric, and 1 tsp salt.
Sauté on medium heat for 8-10 minutes until slightly crispy.
Garnish with 2 tbsp chopped coriander leaves and serve.

name: Lauki Sabzi
steps: Peel and chop 250g bottle gourd into cubes.
Heat 2 tbsp oil in a pan, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté 3-4 minutes.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, cook 3 minutes.
Add bottle gourd, stir well, cover and cook for 10-12 minutes.
Serve hot with roti or rice.

name: Tinda Masala
steps: Peel and chop 250g tinda into small pieces.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes until golden.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, cook 3-4 minutes.
Add tinda pieces, cover and cook for 12 minutes on low heat.
Add 1 tsp garam masala, mix, cook 2 more minutes, and serve hot.

name: Karela Sabzi
steps: Wash and slice 250g bitter gourd thinly, remove seeds.
Heat 2 tbsp oil in a pan.
Add sliced bitter gourd, 100g chopped onions, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp red chili powder, and 1 tsp salt.
Cook on medium heat for 12-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot.

name: Aloo Methi
steps: Boil 300g potatoes, peel and dice.
Wash 50g fenugreek leaves.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add potatoes, turmeric, salt, red chili powder, sauté 5 minutes.
Add fenugreek leaves, cook 5 more minutes, mix well and serve hot.

name: Chole (Chickpea Curry)
steps: Heat 2 tbsp oil in a pan, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté till golden.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 150g chopped tomatoes, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder, cook 5 minutes.
Add 250g soaked chickpeas, water to cover, cook 15 minutes.
Add 1 tsp garam masala, simmer 2 minutes, serve hot.

name: Rajma Masala
steps: Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté till golden.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 150g chopped tomatoes, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, cook 5 minutes.
Add 250g soaked kidney beans, water to cover, cook 20 minutes.
Add 1 tsp garam masala, simmer 2 minutes, serve hot.

name: Dal Tadka
steps: Boil 200g toor dal in water until soft.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds and 2 crushed garlic cloves.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder, cook 5 minutes.
Pour dal into pan, mix well, simmer 5 minutes and serve hot.

name: Bhindi Do Pyaza
steps: Wash and chop 250g okra, pat dry.
Slice 200g onions.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add onions, sauté until golden brown (5 minutes).
Add okra, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder.
Cook covered for 12 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot.

name: Aloo Palak
steps: Boil 250g potatoes, peel and dice them.
Wash 200g spinach and chop.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add potatoes, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, sauté 5 minutes.
Add spinach, cover and cook 10 minutes on medium heat.
Add 1 tsp garam masala, mix, cook 2 minutes, serve hot.

name: Methi Aloo
steps: Boil 250g potatoes, peel and dice.
Wash 50g fenugreek leaves.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add potatoes, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder, sauté 5 minutes.
Add fenugreek leaves, cook 5 minutes, serve hot.

name: Gajar Matar Sabzi
steps: Peel and chop 150g carrots.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add carrots and 100g peas, sauté 2 minutes.
Add 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, cover and cook 10 minutes.
Add 1 tsp garam masala, mix and serve hot.

name: Tamarind Rice
steps: Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp mustard seeds and 5-6 curry leaves.
Add 1 chopped green chili and cook 30 seconds.
Add 2 tbsp tamarind paste, 1/4 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, stir 1 minute.
Add 250g cooked rice, mix well and heat 2-3 minutes.
Serve hot.

name: Aloo Baingan Sabzi
steps: Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add 200g diced potatoes and 200g diced eggplant, cook 2 minutes.
Add 100g tomatoes, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, cover and cook 12 minutes.
Add 1 tsp garam masala, mix, cook 2 minutes, serve hot.

name: Vegetable Pulao
steps: Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 50g chopped onions, sauté 3 minutes.
Add chopped carrot, peas, capsicum, sauté 2 minutes.
Add 200g washed basmati rice, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, stir 1 minute.
Add 400ml water, cover and cook 15 minutes until rice is done.
Serve hot.

name: Kadai Paneer
steps: Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 100g chopped onions, sauté till golden.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 150g chopped tomatoes, cook 5 minutes.
Add 200g paneer cubes and 100g capsicum, cook 7 minutes.
Add 1 tsp garam masala, mix and serve hot.

name: Vegetable Upma
steps: Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp mustard seeds and 5-6 curry leaves.
Add 50g chopped onions, sauté 2 minutes.
Add 50g carrot and 50g peas, cook 2 minutes.
Add 200g semolina, roast 2 minutes.
Slowly add 500ml water with 1 tsp salt, stir continuously to avoid lumps.
Cook 5-6 minutes on low heat, serve hot.

name: Vegetable Khichdi
steps: Wash 100g rice and 50g moong dal, set aside.
Heat 1 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 50g chopped carrot and 50g peas, sauté 2 minutes.
Add rice and dal, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, stir 1 minute.
Add 500ml water, cover and cook 15 minutes on medium heat.
Serve hot.

name: Cabbage Sabzi
steps: Shred 200g cabbage and set aside.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté until golden (5 minutes).
Add cabbage, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder.
Cover and cook 10 minutes on medium heat, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot.

name: Cauliflower Curry
steps: Chop 250g cauliflower into florets.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, cook 5 minutes.
Add cauliflower, cover, cook 12 minutes on medium heat.
Add 1 tsp garam masala, mix well and serve hot.

name: Tomato Dal
steps: Boil 200g toor dal until soft.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 50g chopped onions, sauté 3 minutes.
Add 150g chopped tomatoes, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder, cook 5 minutes.
Add cooked dal, stir well, simmer 5 minutes.
Add 1/2 tsp garam masala, mix, serve hot.

name: Baingan Aloo
steps: Dice 200g eggplant and 200g potatoes.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add eggplant and potatoes, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, stir 2 minutes.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, cover and cook 12 minutes.
Add 1 tsp garam masala, mix, cook 2 minutes, serve hot.

name: Kadhi Pakora
steps: Mix 100g besan with 200ml yogurt and water to make smooth batter.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Pour the batter into the pan, add 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt.
Cook on low heat for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add 1/2 tsp garam masala, mix, simmer 5 minutes and serve hot.

name: Tawa Paneer
steps: Dice 200g paneer and 100g capsicum.
Heat 2 tbsp oil on a tawa or pan.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté 3 minutes.
Add paneer and capsicum, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder.
Cook 5-6 minutes on medium heat, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot.

name: Vegetable Biryani
steps: Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 50g chopped onions, sauté 3 minutes.
Add chopped carrot, peas, capsicum, sauté 2 minutes.
Add 200g washed basmati rice, 400ml water, 1 tsp salt, stir.
Cover and cook 15 minutes until rice is done.
Add 1 tsp garam masala, mix gently, serve hot.

name: Vegetable Kurma
steps: Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 50g onions, sauté 3 minutes.
Add carrot, beans, peas, capsicum, sauté 2 minutes.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, cook 5 minutes.
Add 50ml cream, mix, cook 3 minutes, serve hot.

name: Paneer Tikka Masala
steps: Cube 200g paneer and set aside.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 100g chopped onions, sauté till golden.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 150g chopped tomatoes, cook 5 minutes.
Add paneer cubes, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp garam masala, 50ml cream, mix.
Cook 5 minutes on low heat, serve hot.

name: Vegetable Korma
steps: Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 50g onions, sauté 3 minutes.
Add carrot, beans, peas, capsicum, sauté 2 minutes.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, 1 tsp salt, cook 5 minutes.
Add 50ml cream, 1 tsp garam masala, mix, cook 3 minutes, serve hot.

name: Matar Paneer
steps: Cube 200g paneer and set aside.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 100g chopped onions, sauté till golden.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 150g chopped tomatoes, cook 5 minutes.
Add 100g peas, mix, cook 5 minutes.
Add paneer cubes, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp garam masala, 50ml cream, cook 3 minutes, serve hot.

name: Palak Paneer
steps: Cube 200g paneer and set aside.
Wash and chop 200g spinach.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 100g chopped onions, sauté till golden.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, cook 5 minutes.
Add spinach, cook 5 minutes until wilted.
Add paneer, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp garam masala, 50ml cream, cook 3 minutes, serve hot.

name: Veg Manchurian
steps: Grate 50g cabbage, 50g carrot, and chop 50g capsicum.
Mix vegetables with 2 tbsp cornflour, shape into balls.
Heat oil, fry balls until golden, set aside.
Heat 1 tbsp oil, sauté 50g chopped onions 2 minutes.
Add 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp chili sauce, 1 tsp salt, cook 1 minute.
Add fried balls, toss well, cook 2 minutes, serve hot.

name: Aloo Gobi
steps: Dice 200g potatoes and 200g cauliflower.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add potatoes and cauliflower, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder, cook 5 minutes.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, cover and cook 10 minutes.
Add 1 tsp garam masala, mix, cook 2 minutes, serve hot.

name: Navratan Korma
steps: Chop all vegetables and paneer into small cubes.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 50g chopped onions, sauté 3 minutes.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, cook 5 minutes.
Add all vegetables and paneer, 1 tsp salt, cover and cook 10 minutes.
Add 50ml cream, 1 tsp garam masala, mix well, cook 3 minutes, serve hot.

name: Veg Pakora
steps: Chop 50g potato, 50g cauliflower, 50g onion.
Mix 100g besan with 50ml water and 1 tsp salt to make batter.
Dip vegetables in batter and deep fry until golden brown.
Drain excess oil, serve hot with chutney.

name: Paneer Butter Masala
steps: Cube 200g paneer.
Heat 2 tbsp butter, add 100g chopped onions, sauté till golden.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 150g chopped tomatoes, cook 5 minutes.
Add paneer cubes, 50ml cream, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp garam masala, cook 5 minutes, serve hot.

name: Chana Masala
steps: Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté till golden.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 150g chopped tomatoes, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder, cook 5 minutes.
Add 250g soaked chickpeas, cook 15 minutes.
Add 1 tsp garam masala, mix, serve hot.

name: Vegetable Jalfrezi
steps: Chop all vegetables into small pieces.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 50g chopped onions, sauté 3 minutes.
Add all vegetables, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder.
Cook covered for 10 minutes on medium heat, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot.

name: Aloo Mutter
steps: Dice 200g potatoes and chop 100g onions.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add potatoes, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder, cook 5 minutes.
Add 100g peas and 100g chopped tomatoes, cook 10 minutes until potatoes are soft.
Add 1 tsp garam masala, mix, serve hot.

name: Aloo Tamatar Sabzi
steps: Dice 200g potatoes and chop 100g onions.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add onions, sauté 5 minutes until golden.
Add 150g chopped tomatoes, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder.
Cook 10 minutes on medium heat until potatoes are soft.
Add 1/2 tsp garam masala, mix, serve hot.

name: Methi Malai Matar
steps: Wash and chop 100g fenugreek leaves.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add peas and fenugreek leaves, cook 7 minutes.
Add 50ml cream, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp garam masala, mix and cook 2 minutes.
Serve hot.

name: Paneer Bhurji
steps: Crumble 200g paneer.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, 50g capsicum, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder.
Cook 7 minutes on medium heat, stirring occasionally.
Add paneer, mix well, cook 2 minutes, serve hot.

name: Lauki Sabzi
steps: Peel and dice 250g bottle gourd.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add diced bottle gourd and 100g chopped tomatoes, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder.
Cover and cook 12 minutes on medium heat, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot.

name: Veg Cutlet
steps: Boil 150g potatoes and mash.
Boil 50g carrot and 50g beans, chop finely, mix with potatoes.
Add 50g bread crumbs, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp garam masala, mix well and form cutlets.
Heat oil in a pan, shallow fry cutlets until golden brown on both sides.
Serve hot with chutney.

name: Veg Hakka Noodles
steps: Boil 200g noodles, drain and set aside.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 50g chopped onions, sauté 2 minutes.
Add 50g chopped carrot, capsicum, cabbage, sauté 3 minutes.
Add noodles, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tsp salt, 1 tbsp chili sauce, toss well.
Cook 2 minutes on high flame, serve hot.

name: Vegetable Spring Roll
steps: Shred 50g cabbage, 50g carrot, chop 50g capsicum.
Mix vegetables with 1 tsp salt and 1 tsp soy sauce.
Place filling in spring roll wrappers and roll tightly.
Deep fry in hot oil until golden brown.
Serve hot with chili sauce.

name: Aloo Capsicum Sabzi
steps: Dice 200g potatoes and 100g capsicum.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add potatoes and capsicum, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder.
Cover and cook 12 minutes on medium heat, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot.

name: Paneer Do Pyaza
steps: Cube 200g paneer.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 150g chopped onions, sauté till golden.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes and 50g capsicum, cook 5 minutes.
Add paneer, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp garam masala, mix well, cook 3 minutes.
Serve hot.

name: Vegetable Fried Rice
steps: Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 50g chopped onions, sauté 2 minutes.
Add chopped carrot, capsicum, peas, sauté 3 minutes.
Add 200g cooked rice, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tsp salt, 1 tbsp chili sauce.
Toss well, cook 2 minutes on high flame, serve hot.

name: Dum Aloo
steps: Boil 200g potatoes and peel them.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 100g chopped onions, sauté till golden.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder, cook 5 minutes.
Add potatoes, cover, cook 10 minutes on low heat.
Add 1 tsp garam masala, mix, serve hot.

name: Methi Aloo
steps: Dice 200g potatoes.
Wash and chop 100g fenugreek leaves.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add potatoes, turmeric, salt, red chili powder, cook 10 minutes.
Add fenugreek leaves, cook 5 minutes, serve hot.

name: Vegetable Pulao
steps: Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 50g chopped onions, sauté 3 minutes.
Add chopped vegetables: carrot, peas, beans, sauté 2 minutes.
Add 200g washed basmati rice, 400ml water, 1 tsp salt.
Cover and cook 15 minutes until rice is done.
Fluff rice and serve hot.

name: Tinda Masala
steps: Peel and chop 250g tinda.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add tinda and 100g chopped tomatoes, turmeric, salt, red chili powder.
Cover and cook 12 minutes on medium heat, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot.

name: Karela Sabzi
steps: Slice 200g bitter gourd thinly and remove seeds.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add bitter gourd, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder.
Cook covered 12 minutes on medium heat, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot.

name: Bhindi Masala
steps: Wash and chop 200g okra.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add okra and 100g chopped tomatoes, turmeric, salt, red chili powder.
Cook 10 minutes on medium heat, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot.

name: Vegetable Kofta Curry
steps: Grate 100g paneer and 100g potato, chop 50g carrot.
Mix vegetables and form small balls (koftas).
Heat oil, deep fry koftas until golden, set aside.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add 150g chopped tomatoes, 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, 1 tsp salt, cook 5 minutes.
Add fried koftas, 50ml cream, 1 tsp garam masala, simmer 5 minutes, serve hot.

name: Rajma Masala
steps: Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté till golden.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 150g chopped tomatoes, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder, cook 5 minutes.
Add 250g soaked kidney beans, cook 15 minutes until soft.
Add 1 tsp garam masala, mix, serve hot.

name: Chili Paneer
steps: Cube 200g paneer and chop 100g capsicum, 100g onion.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, sauté onions 2 minutes.
Add capsicum, sauté 2 minutes.
Add paneer cubes, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp chili sauce, 1 tsp salt.
Cook 3–4 minutes, toss well, serve hot.

name: Vegetable Upma
steps: Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp mustard seeds.
Add 50g chopped onions, sauté 3 minutes.
Add 50g chopped carrot and peas, sauté 2 minutes.
Add 200g semolina, roast 2 minutes.
Add 400ml water, 1 tsp salt, cook 5 minutes, stirring continuously.
Serve hot.

name: Gajar Matar Sabzi
steps: Peel and chop 150g carrots.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add carrots and 100g peas, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder.
Cover and cook 10 minutes on medium heat.
Serve hot.

name: Paneer Tikka Masala
steps: Cube 200g paneer.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 100g chopped onions, sauté till golden.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 150g chopped tomatoes, cook 5 minutes.
Add paneer cubes, 100g chopped capsicum, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp garam masala, 50ml cream, cook 5 minutes, serve hot.

name: Stuffed Capsicum
steps: Wash and hollow 200g capsicum.
Crumble 100g paneer, chop 50g onion, 50g tomato, mix with 1 tsp salt and 1/2 tsp garam masala.
Stuff mixture into capsicum.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, cook stuffed capsicum 10 minutes on medium heat, turning occasionally.
Serve hot.

name: Vegetable Dhokla
steps: Mix 200g gram flour with 100ml yogurt, 50ml water, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp baking soda to make batter.
Grate 50g carrot and 50g capsicum, fold into batter.
Grease a steaming dish, pour batter, steam 15 minutes.
Cool, cut into pieces, drizzle 2 tbsp oil, serve hot.

name: Baingan Bharta
steps: Roast 250g eggplant until soft, peel and mash.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, cook 5 minutes.
Add mashed eggplant, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp garam masala, cook 5 minutes, serve hot.

name: Aloo Baingan Sabzi
steps: Dice 200g potatoes and 200g eggplant.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add potatoes, eggplant, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, cover and cook 12 minutes.
Serve hot.

name: Vegetable Sambar
steps: Cook 100g toor dal until soft.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp mustard seeds.
Add 50g chopped onions, sauté 3 minutes.
Add 50g carrot, 50g drumstick, 50g chopped tomatoes, turmeric, salt, cook 5 minutes.
Add cooked dal and 1 tbsp tamarind paste, simmer 5 minutes, serve hot.

name: Vegetable Idli
steps: Chop 50g carrot and mix with 50g peas.
Fold vegetables into 200g idli batter, add 1/2 tsp salt.
Grease idli molds, pour batter, steam 10–12 minutes.
Cool slightly, remove idlis, serve hot with chutney.

name: Vegetable Kofta Curry (Paneer Kofta)
steps: Grate 100g paneer and 100g potato, chop 50g carrot.
Mix and form small koftas, deep fry until golden.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add 150g chopped tomatoes, 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, 1 tsp salt, cook 5 minutes.
Add fried koftas, 50ml cream, 1 tsp garam masala, simmer 5 minutes, serve hot.

name: Paneer Pasanda
steps: Cube 200g paneer and stuff with small amount of grated paneer if desired.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 100g chopped onions, sauté till golden.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 150g chopped tomatoes, 50g capsicum, cook 5 minutes.
Add paneer, 50ml cream, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp garam masala, cook 5 minutes, serve hot.

name: Palak Paneer
steps: Blanch 200g spinach, puree it.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 100g chopped onions, sauté till golden.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, cook 5 minutes.
Add 200g paneer cubes and spinach puree, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp garam masala, 50ml cream, cook 5 minutes, serve hot.

name: Chole Masala
steps: Boil 250g soaked chickpeas until soft.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 150g chopped tomatoes, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder, cook 5 minutes.
Add chickpeas, 1 tsp garam masala, simmer 10 minutes, serve hot.

name: Aloo Gobi
steps: Dice 200g potatoes and break 200g cauliflower into small florets.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add potatoes, cauliflower, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, cover and cook 12 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot.

name: Vegetable Kurma
steps: Chop all vegetables: carrot, beans, peas, capsicum.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, cook 5 minutes.
Add all vegetables, 100ml coconut milk, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp garam masala, simmer 10 minutes.
Serve hot.

name: Paneer Butter Masala
steps: Cube 200g paneer.
Heat 2 tbsp butter, add 100g chopped onions, sauté till golden.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 150g chopped tomatoes, cook 5 minutes.
Add paneer, 50ml cream, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp garam masala, cook 5 minutes, serve hot.

name: Mixed Vegetable Curry
steps: Dice all vegetables: potato, carrot, beans.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add vegetables and 100g chopped tomatoes, turmeric, salt, red chili powder.
Cook 12 minutes on medium heat, stirring occasionally.
Add 1 tsp garam masala, mix well, serve hot.

name: Tawa Paneer
steps: Cube 200g paneer, chop 100g capsicum and 100g onion.
Heat 2 tbsp oil on a tawa or pan.
Add onions and capsicum, sauté 3 minutes.
Add paneer cubes, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder, 1/2 tsp garam masala.
Cook 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, serve hot.

name: Paneer Bhurji (Spiced Scrambled Paneer)
steps: Crumble 200g paneer.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes and 50g chopped capsicum, cook 5 minutes.
Add paneer, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp red chili powder, cook 2–3 minutes.
Serve hot.

name: Aloo Methi Masala
steps: Dice 200g potatoes, wash and chop 100g fenugreek leaves.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add potatoes, turmeric, salt, red chili powder, cook 10 minutes.
Add fenugreek leaves, cook 5 minutes, serve hot.

name: Veg Jalfrezi
steps: Chop all vegetables: capsicum, carrot, beans, onion, tomato.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, sauté onions 2 minutes.
Add other vegetables, cook 5 minutes.
Add 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp garam masala, 1 tbsp soy sauce, stir well.
Cook 3 more minutes, serve hot.

name: Paneer Lababdar
steps: Cube 200g paneer.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 100g chopped onions, sauté till golden.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 150g chopped tomatoes, cook 5 minutes.
Add paneer, 50ml cream, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp garam masala, cook 5 minutes, serve hot.

name: Vegetable Handi
steps: Dice all vegetables: potato, cauliflower, carrot.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, sauté 5 minutes.
Add vegetables, 50g peas, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp garam masala, cover and cook 12 minutes.
Serve hot.

name: Aloo Palak
steps: Dice 200g potatoes, wash 200g spinach.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp cumin seeds.
Add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add potatoes, turmeric, salt, red chili powder, cook 10 minutes.
Add spinach, cook 5 minutes, serve hot.

name: Vegetable Manchurian
steps: Grate 100g cabbage, 50g carrot, 50g beans, chop 100g onion.
Mix vegetables with 50g cornflour and form balls.
Deep fry balls until golden brown.
In a pan, add soy sauce, chili sauce, salt, sauté 2 minutes.
Add fried balls, toss well, cook 2 more minutes, serve hot.

name: Paneer Shahi Korma
steps: Cube 200g paneer.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 100g chopped onions, sauté till golden.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 150g chopped tomatoes, cook 5 minutes.
Add paneer, 50ml cream, 50g cashew paste, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp garam masala, simmer 5 minutes, serve hot.

name: Mushroom Masala
steps: Slice 200g mushrooms.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 100g chopped onions, sauté till golden.
Add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 100g chopped tomatoes, cook 5 minutes.
Add mushrooms, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp garam masala, cook 7–8 minutes, serve hot.

name: Paneer Makhani
steps: Cube 200g paneer.
Heat 2 tbsp butter, add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, cook 1 minute.
Add 150g chopped tomatoes, cook 5 minutes.
Add paneer, 50ml cream, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp garam masala, simmer 5 minutes, serve hot.

name: Vegetable Kofta Curry (Final Recipe)
steps: Grate 100g paneer and 100g potato, chop 50g carrot and 50g peas.
Mix and form small koftas, deep fry until golden.
Heat 2 tbsp oil, add 100g chopped onions, sauté 5 minutes.
Add 150g chopped tomatoes, 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, 1 tsp salt, cook 5 minutes.
Add fried koftas, 50ml cream, 1 tsp garam masala, simmer 5 minutes, serve hot.
